textPlain:
Current submission title “Print, a one-line BASIC program” is not great. Title from the page:  10 PRINT CHR$(205.5+RND(1)); : GOTO 10

Could also be something like “10 PRINT: a book about a one-line Commodore 64 BASIC program” (taken from the first sentence with “is” changed to a colon).
This is indescribably beautiful. Thanks for sharing it! It went straight to the top of my reading queue.
From the text: “10 PRINT is a book about a one-line Commodore 64 BASIC program, published in November 2012.”10 PRINT is their official shortened version.
